gameDetails.name: Zooloretto: Rio Grande Games Expansion Pack #2
gameDetails.description:
Rio Grande Games calls its second collected Zooloretto expansion set (SKU 382) Zooloretto: Gorilla after its primary component.

Contains five mini-expansions originally released separately:

     for Zooloretto
         Gorilla
         Job Boards
         The Savings Book
    
     for Aquaretto
         Three Coworker Tiles
         The Trains
    


Home Page & Newsletter:

     www.zooloretto.com 


(German, english, dutch, hungarian, spanish, swedish)
